title: Project Fiora
body: I'm currently in the process of attempting to recreate fioras blade from the project fiora skin. Does anyone have details as far as how long the blade is, width, etc? Or reference art. Any help will be appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Here's the original concept for the skin - 

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/5113e099e7296ede80306c860e42683f.jpg

I don't have exact dimensions for you, but would be happy to provide a few in-game shots, if you'd like. :)
omg a rioter in the concept and creations, I feel sad now. They do exist and my hard work is unnoticed *cries in emo corner*

> [{quoted}](name=Kitty Katarina,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=fw5ThAeL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-11T20:50:29.299+0000)
>
> omg a rioter in the concept and creations, I feel sad now. They do exist and my hard work is unnoticed *cries in emo corner*

same.
gota have a gift for the arts to get recognized here.
Or just find someone elses SEXY art, to get recognized...

I came across it but noticed it lacked detail from the skin art so I was able to use that as a base and then add detail from the skin art. I'm close to finalizing the design and will begin printing it soon once I'm happy with how the LEDS will fit. I would love some shots of the part of the blade body that sticks out almost wing like. Thank you for your reply as well.

Ah, gotcha. You'll have to show me what it looks like when it's done! 

Are these more of what you're looking for? 

https://imgur.com/a/wVlls

https://imgur.com/a/Q2FIK
